name: com.spellboundstudios.geoforge
description: This is a destructible/terraformable terrain package based on Marching Cubes Desnsity Voxels.

samples.description: Additional Assets, including the Shadergraph from which the Material Shader was generated
Sample Scene for digging a large and very deep hole.
Sample Scene for Mining discrete ore veins where the ore feels like it has a health pool
Sample Scene for Orbiting Planets; GeoForge volumes in motion.
